long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SkyNote Clipper is a companion app for SkyNote. This extension makes it super easy to capture content from the web. 

Save Links Easily: Capture just the title, URL, and description of any webpage with a single click. Perfect for bookmarking articles, videos, or resources for later use.

Full Page Capture: Save the entire content of a webpage in a clean, readable format. SkyNote Clipper removes clutter and converts content into Markdown for easy organization and readability.

Save Selected Text: Highlight any part of a webpage and save only the selected content. Keep only the information you need, directly in your notes

Summarize Youtube Videos: Save the summary of YouTube Video for future reference!
